short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reelay records, transcribes, generates AI meeting minutes, summaries, key moments & distributes recorded meetings to your team.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reelay is meeting productivity software for high performing sales and project teams. Our AI powered platform helps enterprise customers save 2-3 hours of admin time per meeting, per employee with automated call recaps, corporate minutes reports, transcribed recordings and actionable insights. In seconds, you can embed Reelay directly into your work calendar and have our meeting attendant join any video call with you, or or on your behalf.
